coded_answer.p: I am writing to givinggive you information about myself.

Even though I would like to travel, I am only available in July, because I am a high school student. Thus I have not got a long holiday. I just have one month left. Personally, I would rather stay in log cabins than in tents. On accoundaccount of the fact that to staystaying in log cabins areis as much more interesting than staying in tents. As far as two activities are concerned, I would choose singing and photography. I used to win a number of competitions in singing. I can sing a plenty of songs., which include the englishEnglish songsongs and the japenesejapaneseJapanese songsongs, and I have a part-time job for siningsinging at a restaurant. Although the photography is not as good as the singing, I am very interested in it. I have been learningstudying photography since I was 15 yearyears old. I look forward to hearing from you.
